Rooms.Name: Examination Room
Rooms.Description:
What appears to be an examination room with three walls, one of which is curved outward and has a door in it. In this hospital-like room you also notice some advanced looking medical equipment. 
Next to the examination table you woke up on is a surgical instrument trolley with a keycard on it, and some type of body scanning device. In the cabinets on the wall there is something that resembles medicine.

Rooms.Name: Engine Room
Rooms.Description:
A large space with a multi-colored glow, the walls are full of electronics arrays, there are tanks around the room filled with some type of fluid. 
There are two piping loops that link together for some reason.

Rooms.Name: Bridge
Rooms.Description:
A room that appears to be where the ship is steered from. There are a few instrument panels that look like they may be used for navigation. One area appears to be dedicated to piloting a ship, 
it has a comfy chair, extra electronic arrays around it and what appears to be controls for piloting the ship.

Rooms.Name: Waste Excretion Facility
Rooms.Description: This room resembles a bathroom in some ways. Though more advanced and oddly a bit more dangerous. You see a sanitation vessel and three sea shells.  You guess they are for cleaning your hands, but you don't know how they work.

Rooms.Name: Nutrient Paste Dispensary
Rooms.Description: A large Cafeteria-style room, there is one large oval shaped station with 2 types of dispensing machines. The room has a band, and vending machines, and something that clearly resembles a bar.

Rooms.Name: Specimen Storage
Rooms.Description: A room full of tanks filled with green goop with what can contain different life-forms, some familiar, some unfamiliar

Rooms.Name: Crews Quarters
Rooms.Description:
A cramped room with columns of sleep pods stacked 3 high lining the walls. There are storage lockers in-between each column that appear to house personal belongings. 
There is a single vid-screen along one of the walls squeezed between sleep pod columns and a small work bench of some kind squeezed into the only leftover space in the room.  
Perhaps I can use the workbench to craft something...

Rooms.Name: Officers Quarters
Rooms.Description: A larger room with 2 sleep pods, 2 desks, and 2 vid-screens. The overall quality of this room seems better.

Rooms.Name: Shuttle Bay
Rooms.Description:
A large open cargo-bay like space. There are smaller, shiny spacecraft in here. There are robots moving around cargo stacking some kind of containers, and maintaining the spacecraft. 
On the far end of the hangar there is a Control Panel with a lot of lights.

Items.Name: Surgical Instrument Trolley
Items.Description: A cart that should have had surgical instruments on it. In their place lies a Body-Scanning Device and a Key Card.

Items.Name: Body-Scanning Device
Items.Description: You think this devices is intended for anatomical scanning, but it looks really similar to a nightstick. You could probably bash some head with it.

Items.Name: Medicine
Items.Description: This looks like an assortment of medicines, probably shouldn't use any until you find out what they do.

Items.Name: key card
Items.Description: This looks an awful lot like a key-card from one of them new-fangled SYE-FIE shows

Items.Name: Spectrographic Protoplasm
Items.Description:
looks like it might be some kind of energy source. Its the same stuff that is running through the loops. Its a silver glitter-like substance that emits a rainbow mist into the clear tubes. 
I think I'll call it Unicorn Farts from now on.

Items.Name: Power Control Panel
Items.Description: Has different arrays of graphs and indications in foreign text. These look like important indications for the power source

Items.Name: Advanced Electronic Panels
Items.Description: These electronic panels have a low humming sound to them. They probably get information for the power source.

Items.Name: Coolant Tanks
Items.Description: These tanks are huge. They must be at least 20 feet in diameter. They seem to be helping control the fuel burning process.

Items.Name: Hand-wavium fusion/fission loop
Items.Description: Takes the output power from one loop and then supplies the other. The glitter turns into rainbow mist and returns back to glitter

Items.Name: Navigation Console
Items.Description: An assortment of what look like maps and charts except they are made out of light. I wonder what would happen if i touched it.

Items.Name: Pilot Chair
Items.Description: A super comfy looking chair with clusters of instruments to look at.

Items.Name: Tanks filled with green goop and various organisms
Items.Description: The specimen are suspended in the green goop. I wonder if I got a hold of it what else it could be used for.

Items.Name: Shiny Spacecraft
Items.Description: A smaller looking spaceship. I wonder if I could teach myself to fly one.

Items.Name: Unicorn Fart fuel cells
Items.Description: A container full of the some glitter-like material. I wonder why it is in here.

Items.Name: Space Crates
Items.Description: Super heavy duty crates made of some polymer. The robots are pushing them around. I wonder whats in them.

Items.Name: Control Panel with Lots of Lights
Items.Description: A control Panel with lots of flashing lights on it. Some of these buttons look important. I wonder if these control access to this room. I probably shouldn't mess with these since I can't read.

Items.Name: Robot Workers
Items.Description: large robots with track-like tires, they keep moving things around and fixing up the shiny spacecraft. They just making a beeping and whirring sound as they work.

Items.Name: Alien Cow Milk Dispenser
Items.Description: A large tank that dispenses a blue milk-like substance.

Items.Name: Control Panel
Items.Description: This is probably used to control the doors to let the shuttles in and out. Too bad you can't read any of the controls.

Items.Name: nanofactory
Items.Description: You watch in amazement as this thing seems to build stuff from nothing.

Items.Name: vid-screen
Items.Description: These floating screens look really fancy. Too fancy for you to figure out.

Items.Name: sleep-pods
Items.Description: You're willing to wager money that these are beds, but you have no clue how to get into one.

Items.Name: foot-lockers
Items.Description: You guess these small pod-looking things are storage, but you don't know how to open them.

Items.Name: specimen tanks
Items.Description: These creepy looking tanks have an assortment of bizarre creatures suspended in some sort of fluid.

Items.Name: Alien Vending Machine
Items.Description: A vending machine filled with various organisms and intergalactic snacks, some of them are still wriggling.

Items.Name: Alien Band Playing Music
Items.Description: An eclectic group of humanoid-looking aliens playing requests

Items.Name: Alien Bar
Items.Description: Even in space this is easily recognizeable as a bar based on the atmosphere and the culture surrounding it. I probably should avoid the bar for right now. I don't want to poison myself.

Items.Name: Multi-Lingual Neural Mechanical Translator (MLNMT)
Items.Description: A translator object that would allow you to communicate with any species anywhere.

Items.Name: Arcanospanner
Items.Description: An item used for crafting.

Items.Name: Greenprints projector do-hickey
Items.Description: This says that you will need an Arcanospanner, a Communication buffer GUI, and a Springy Thingy to make a universal translator.

Items.Name: Communication buffer GUI
Items.Description: An item used for crafting.

Items.Name: Springy Thingy
Items.Description: An item used for crafting.

Items.Name: hand-wavium fusion/fission reactor loop
Items.Description: This device appears to generate power by transferring a sparkly, multi-colored gas between two reactors. The stuff looks like what you'd expect unicorn farts to look like.

Items.Name: excrement purge vessels
Items.Description: This looks like it's made to contain and extract bodily waste so it doesn't float around.

Items.Name: sanitation vessels
Items.Description: You guess these three sea shells are for cleaning your hands, but you don't know how they work.

Items.Name: excrement purge vessels
Items.Description: This looks like it's made to contain and extract bodily waste so it doesn't float around.

Items.Name: sterilization facility
Items.Description: This archway makes you feel fuzzy and your teeth feel really weird every time you walk through it.

NPCs.Name: alien1
Alternate Dialogue: Hello? Woah! Wait, you can talk?
Sorry, we didn't know human beings on Earth were intelligent lifeforms. We usually don't pick up intelligent life.
This is both exciting and terrifying. We found new intelligent life.
This is an HR nightmare

NPCs.Name: alien2
Alternate Dialogue: Heeeeeeeey
Hey, terribly sorry about the whole abducting you thing, while you're aboard feel free to get some food from the nutrient paste dispensary. I think it will be safe for humans.
I am surprised you figured out how to use the greenprints to make the translator.
The Intergalactic Federation of Taxonomic Regulations for Intelligent Life is going to have a field day with this
You scared the sniglforks out of Phil in Observation, he grabbed his medical equipment and ran as fast as he could. HAHAHA, I cant believe he forgot his key card.

NPCs.Name: alien3
Alternate Dialogue: Hey, I guess we are going to have to get permission to re-reoute and get you home. Sorry about the mix-up.
Feel free to look around the ship while we head back towards earth, just stay out of anywhere that requires DG-16 Clearance on it, its written on the door, you can't miss it.
I would avoid eating anything out of the vending machine for now, Phil didn't get to complete a scan of your digestive system.

NPCs.Name: alien4
Alternate Dialogue: I wonder if they will give you the standard memory erase or something more thorough.
Well, looks like we might have to contact some people about faking another Roswell

NPCs.Name: alien5
Alternate Dialogue: Wow, an Intelligent human! I never would have guessed we would have one of these onboard.
I have a million questions to ask you
When will you guys figure out how to galaxy jump
What are your thoughts on basic quantum entanglement
Will humans ever get rid of that dinosaur space house rotating in your planets orbit?
What is your favorite human food?

Splash Text: Collect the parts to make a translation device so you can convince the aliens to take you home! If you get stuck, [inspect]ing items can give some useful information...

Crafting Recipes.Name: Translator Recipe
Crafting Recipes.Description: A recipe for making a language translator for talk to aliens.
